price: (Yaa Muhammad!) Obsi Dhugumatti, waadaan Rabbii dhugaadha. Isaan (Qiyaamaa) hin dhugoomsine akka si hin xiqqeessine.
arabic: فَٱصۡبِرۡ إِنَّ وَعۡدَ ٱللَّهِ حَقّٞۖ وَلَا يَسۡتَخِفَّنَّكَ ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'bir inna waʿda al-lahi ḥaqqun walā yastakhiffannaka alladhīna lā yūqinūna
